user.title: Humidity Control
user.description: Set up a unified air quality and humidity controller

data_description.name: Name for this humidity control entity

humidifier.title: Multi-Level Humidifier
humidifier.description: Configure a multi-level humidifier with power and fan level control

data_description.humidifier_power_entity: Switch entity to turn humidifier on/off (e.g., switch.robby_power)
data_description.humidifier_level_entity: Select entity for fan level (e.g., select.robby_fan_level)
data_description.humidifier_levels: Available humidifier levels from lowest to highest output

air_quality.title: Air Quality Sensors
air_quality.description: Configure CO2 and VOC sensors for air quality monitoring

data_description.co2_target: CO2 level above which ventilation starts (default: 600 ppm)
data_description.co2_critical: CO2 level requiring maximum ventilation (default: 900 ppm)
data_description.voc_target: VOC level above which ventilation starts (default: 100)

ventilation.title: Ventilation Control
ventilation.description: Configure ventilation system for air exchange and dehumidification

data_description.ventilation_entity: Climate or fan entity for ventilation (e.g., climate.nilan_hvac)
data_description.ventilation_levels: Available fan levels from off (0) to maximum

options.title: Humidity Options
options.description: Configure humidity control settings and tolerances

data_description.dry_tolerance: How far below target before humidifying starts
data_description.wet_tolerance: How far above target before dehumidifying starts
data_description.keep_alive: Interval to resend commands to devices
data_description.sensor_stale_duration: Turn off if sensor doesn't update within this time
data_description.initial_state: Whether to start enabled when Home Assistant starts
data_description.away_humidity: Target humidity when in away mode
data_description.away_fixed: If enabled, away humidity cannot be changed

timing.title: Timing & Boost
timing.description: Configure minimum action durations and boost mode helper

data_description.min_humidify_duration: Minimum time humidifier runs before changing (prevents cycling)
data_description.min_ventilate_duration: Minimum time ventilation runs before changing (prevents cycling)
data_description.boost_helper: Optional input_boolean to trigger boost mode via UI or automation

abort.already_configured: This humidity control is already configured

humidity.title: Humidity Settings
humidity.description: Configure humidity control settings and tolerances

data_description.dry_tolerance: How far below target before humidifying starts
data_description.wet_tolerance: How far above target before dehumidifying starts
data_description.keep_alive: Interval to resend commands to devices
data_description.sensor_stale_duration: Turn off if sensor doesn't update within this time
data_description.initial_state: Whether to start enabled when Home Assistant starts
data_description.away_humidity: Target humidity when in away mode
data_description.away_fixed: If enabled, away humidity cannot be changed

air_quality.description: Configure CO2 and VOC sensors for air quality monitoring

data_description.co2_target: CO2 level above which ventilation starts

boost.name: Activate Boost Mode
boost.description: Activate boost mode for rapid air exchange. Sets ventilation to maximum for the specified duration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Duration in seconds for boost mode (default: 1200 = 20 minutes)

stop_boost.name: Stop Boost Mode
stop_boost.description: Immediately deactivate boost mode and return to normal operation.
